SEO_TITLE: Kelvin Maina Wangari - Technical Educator & Software Developer
SEO_DESCRIPTION: A results-oriented Software Developer and IT Consultant with over five years of experience in full-lifecycle software development, including mobile and web applications. Proven ability to deliver high-quality solutions, from concept to deployment, for a diverse clientele. Possesses strong expertise in cloud infrastructure management, data analysis, and technical instruction. A dedicated and fast learner, committed to leveraging emerging technologies to solve complex problems and drive user engagement.

HERO.NAME: Kelvin Maina Wangari
HERO.TITLE: Technical Educator & Software Developer
HERO.DESCRIPTION: I'm a Software Developer, IT Consultant, and Computer Science Educator with over five years of experience working across both tech and education. I build web and mobile apps, work with cloud tools and data, and also love teaching ICT in a hands-on, project-based way. Whether it's solving real-world problems with code or helping students grow their tech skills, Iâ€™m passionate about making an impact in both industries.
